block.p: American League TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Agreed to terms with Tony LaCava, director player personnel; Dick Scott, director player development; Jon Lalonde, director scouting; Sal Butera, special assistant to the general manager and Charlie Wilson, manager minor league operations on three-year contract extensions, through the 2010 season.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Activated OF Carlos Quentin from the 15-day DL. Optioned INF Brian Barden to Tucson (PCL). CINCINNATI REDS--Agreed to terms with OF-INF Ryan Freel on a two-year contract extension through the 2009 season. COLORADO ROCKIES--Placed RHP Byung-Hyun Kim on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of RHP Zach McClellan from Colorado Springs (PCL).

CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed FB Alan Ricard and TE Ryan Krause to one-year contracts. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed C Johnathan Ingram and RB Ray Perkins. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Signed WR Cortez Hankton. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed K E.J. Cochrane to a three-year contract. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Signed G Chris Gray to a two-year contract.

ANAHEIM DUCKS--Recalled F Joe Motzko and F Drew Miller from Portland (AHL). CAROLINA HURRICANES--Named Greg Stefan assistant coach and goaltending coach. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Signed C-D Brian Boyle to a two-year contract.

COLLEGE OF NEW JERSEY--Announced the resignation of Kevin McHugh, athletic director, who has accepted a position as director of athletics and chair of the department of physical education at Bates College. KENTUCKY--Named Glynn Cyprien and Jeremy Cox men's assistant basketball coaches. LIBERTY--Named Alexis Sherard women's assistant basketball coach. NEW MEXICO--Named Billy Garrett and Ryan Miller men's assistant basketball coaches. RUTGERS-NEWARK--Announced the resignation of Sean Byron, men's and women's volleyball coach.

American League TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Agreed to terms with Tony LaCava, director player personnel; Dick Scott, director player development; Jon Lalonde, director scouting; Sal Butera, special assistant to the general manager and Charlie Wilson, manager minor league operations on three-year contract extensions, through the 2010 season.

KENTUCKY--Named Glynn Cyprien and Jeremy Cox men's assistant basketball coaches. LIBERTY--Named Alexis Sherard women's assistant basketball coach.
